Hello, I'm Martin Adriaensen, but that you already know. What you might not know is how I came to work in front-end development.

After changing my mind about my career a few times through High-School and College I came to the conclusion that I wanted a job that would use both technical skills and creativity and thus oriented myself toward Cepegra in september 2018 to learn more about the profession.

The formation lasted 7 months during which I strenghtened my knowledge in HTML&CSS but also developed new skills (Git, Vue, ...)

You can download my resume to learn more about me
